frame.name: Rashness
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Protagonist</fen> performs some <fen>Action</fen> without fully considering the circumstances under which he or she acts, or the possibly (negative) consequences of the <fen>Action</fen>. Alternatively, the <fen>Action</fen> itself may be portrayed as having been performed under rushed circumstances.
<ex>Would it <m>be</m> a little <t>impatient</t> <fex name="pro">of me</fex> <fex name="act">to ask when an album might appear</fex>?</ex> <ex>He was quick to move, alert and forceful, as <fex name="pro">he</fex> <m>was</m> <t>impetuous</t> <fex name="act">in attacking an enemy</fex></ex></def-root>

FE.name: Protagonist
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> acts or is apt to act with some degree of consideration regarding the circumstances and possible consequences of an <fen>Action</fen> he or she may perform.
<ex>I feel that most do, but typically <fex name="pro">people</fex> <m>are</m> <t>rash</t>, and often reach anger and hostility quickly.</ex> <ex>I think it <m>was</m> <t>patient</t> <fex name="pro">of me</fex> <fex name="act">to wait another month</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Action
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Action</fen> is carried out by the <fen>Protagonist</fen> with or without regard for the circumstances under which it is performed or consideration of possible consequences.
<ex><fex name="act">What he did</fex> <m>was</m> <t>impetuous</t> and quite irrational - some might say ill-considered.</ex> <ex>Caryn thinks Tom made a <t>rash</t> <fex name="act">choice</fex> by electing to move to the new camp.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition:
<def-root>The period of time when the <fen>Protagonist</fen> acts with (or without) consideration regarding an <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex><m>Were</m> n't you <t>impetuous</t> <fex name="tim">when you were young</fex>?</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The extent to which the <fen>Action</fen> of the <fen>Protagonist</fen> deviates from the expected in its rashness. </def-root>

FE.name: Judge
FE.definition: <def-root>The individual whose point of view is taken in assigning the judgment denoted by the target.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: rash.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: acting or done impetuously, without careful consideration.

lexUnit.name: impatient.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: having or showing a lack of patience or tolerance.

lexUnit.name: impetuous.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: acting or done quickly and rashly.

lexUnit.name: patient.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: acting without haste, with reasonable consideration.

lexUnit.name: precipitate.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: done, acting, or occurring suddenly or without careful consideration.
